posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Hello all,
I'm gonna be super-brief, because my time is limited, so, straight to the point.

I was thinking lately that we are having a lack of "desire" for lack of a better word, to build towards expanding our level-20 & level-30 sections of the forum.
I know for a fact, that I had plans to make at least half-a-dozen builds for the level-20 sub-forum, including a Ranger 15/ Fighter4/ Rogue 1 & a half-orcish Fighter 6/ Bard 4/ Pale-Master 10, to name a few.
Building for the level-20 & level-30 sub-forums can be a really rewarding experience since so many spots have been left untouched & there is so much room for innovation.
Besides, there are many folks around that play on RP-oriented servers & almost all of them are level 20/30 capped & could really use our help.

That's all, feel free to agree or disagree with this, I'm interested in hearing your thoughts.

posts.author: Aquarius 233
posts.content: That's a great proposal from my point of view, lv 20 is sometimes the cap in offline modules, so this will surely give some ideas and proposals for new characters!

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I'm with you all the way on this, Valerfor.

Many PWs and most modules won't allow you the luxury of playing at level 40, and many players either don't have the inclination or facility to do so, and we would be remiss in our mission to assist in building to all levels unless we gave those level 20 and 30 builds some love.

And apart from helping players, it's surely a good discipline for the builder to squeeze what they can into the levels available. I've seen several putative builds lately that take pre-epic feats in epic levels - and that's a luxury only afforded by builds that will reach those glorified heights. How quickly we forget...

So yes, an excellent idea. Builders get to hone their skills, players get to benefit - win /win!

(And Mick started up something similar back in November 2017 about quality low-level - below 10 builds which we may sadly have let rot on the vine... https://www.tapatalk.com/groups/nwnecbguild/what-makes-a-strong-low-level-1-10-build-t2354767.html)

Still, what can we do but do better?
